attributes.action: Cap the price of tax on fuel to stabilize the fuel prices within our Country.
attributes.additional_details: Have a floating taxation on fuel, so when the price of fuel goes up, the tax goes down, keeping the price set. When the price goes down the tax goes up, so the price never changes. This would work for everyone. Also Capping the price at 99 pence per litre, would get this country moving again. Help EVERYONE and sign today.
